Create Layout for "stackplot"

Source: R/stackplot.R
stackplotLayout.Rd

Create Layout for "stackplot"

stackplotLayout(heights.cm, margins.top.cm, margins.bottom.cm,
  show = FALSE)

Arguments

heights.cm

heights of plots in cm

margins.top.cm

top margins of plots in cm

margins.bottom.cm

bottom margins of plots in cm

show

if TRUE the layout is shown in the form of a plot with the borders between the different plot sections being indicated
